about_the_game:
Build your dream football team from the ground up and manage their way to fame and glory with one of the most robust sports management sim systems available, designed from the ground up by passionate sports fans, the same team behind Blackout Rugby.

Blackout Football Manager puts you in charge of your team’s most critical functions, from deciding the best training regimes to installing the perfect club facilities and even managing your team’s finances – but only the fun parts. Your club’s board handles the mundane things like actually keeping track of money so you can just make and spend it.

Blackout Football Manager features a card system that helps you organize your day and rewards you with boosts for certain actions. Whether you prioritize training or strategizing for an upcoming match is up to you, but every action has consequences on how your team performs. Think carefully before deciding who to bench and how best to build your club.

Every potential team member has a unique set of mental and physical traits that distinguishes their performance on the field and helps inform your match-day plans. Scout the opposition and create a strategy that plays to your team’s unique strengths,and if you have a gap that needs filling, head to the in-game market or scout the competition to sign some new talent with Blackout Football Manager’s streamlined negotiation system.

Key Features:
● Deep, yet easy to learn team and club management
● Unique player attributes to help build strong and varied teams
● Customizable lineups and team formations!
● Extensive tech trees for customizing your club and infrastructure
● Robust in-game market for easy player trading
● Streamlined money and contract managing
● A innovative, unique card system, allowing you to prioritize performance!
● Deep and highly customizable training regimes.
● Extensive customizable tactics, allowing you to show off your football knowledge.
● And much more!

Build your dream football team from the ground up and manage their way to fame and glory with one of the most robust sports management sim systems available, designed from the ground up by passionate sports fans, the same team behind Blackout Rugby.

Blackout Football Manager puts you in charge of your team’s most critical functions, from deciding the best training regimes to installing the perfect club facilities and even managing your team’s finances – but only the fun parts. Your club’s board handles the mundane things like actually keeping track of money so you can just make and spend it.

Blackout Football Manager features a card system that helps you organize your day and rewards you with boosts for certain actions. Whether you prioritize training or strategizing for an upcoming match is up to you, but every action has consequences on how your team performs. Think carefully before deciding who to bench and how best to build your club.

Every potential team member has a unique set of mental and physical traits that distinguishes their performance on the field and helps inform your match-day plans. Scout the opposition and create a strategy that plays to your team’s unique strengths,and if you have a gap that needs filling, head to the in-game market or scout the competition to sign some new talent with Blackout Football Manager’s streamlined negotiation system.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min screen size: 1280x720

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min screen size: 1280x720

name: Blackout Football - Manager Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min screen size: 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take your place as head coach and club manager in this Online Multiplayer Football Manager game. Your knowledge will be tested as you take your club to new heights and square up against other real users world-wide. Do you have what it takes to be the greatest Football Manager?
